mapper.insert: INSERT INTO KOCO_BOARD(BOARD_CATEGORY, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_REGDATE, READCOUNT, FILE_NAME, THUMBNAIL, USER_NO) VALUES(3, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, NOW(), 0, #{fileName}, #{thumbnail}, 28)
mapper.select: select BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, user.USER_NICKNAME as writer, DATE_FORMAT(BOARD_REGDATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS BOARD_REGDATE , READCOUNT, FILE_NAME, THUMBNAIL from KOCO_BOARD as board, KOCO_USERS as user where BOARD_NO=#{boardNo} and board.USER_NO=user.USER_NO

select BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, user.USER_NICKNAME as writer, DATE_FORMAT(BOARD_REGDATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS BOARD_REGDATE , READCOUNT, FILE_NAME, THUMBNAIL from KOCO_BOARD as board, KOCO_USERS as user where BOARD_NO=#{boardNo} and board.USER_NO=user.USER_NO
